text: This article lists all the confirmed national football squads for the UEFA Women's Euro 1997. Players marked (c) were named as captain for their national squad. ==Group A== ====== Head coach: Aimé Mignot ====== Head coach: Yuri Bystritsky ====== Head coach: Ignacio Quereda ====== Head coach: Marika Domanski-Lyfors Sweden caps and goals based on compilation of match reports at https://www.svenskfotboll.se/landslag/dam/landskamper-1973-2000/ ==Group B== ====== Head coach: Jørgen Hvidemose ====== Head coach: Tina Theune-Meyer ====== Head coach: Sergio Guenza ====== Head coach: Per-Mathias Høgmo ==External links== * 1997 - Match Details at RSSSF.com Squads 1997
title: UEFA Women's Euro 1997 squads
